title: Guys. ┬─┬ノ( º _ ºノ)
body:
Everything will be fine. I promise

┬─┬ノ( º _ ºノ)

Don't rage at Riot yet. They're probably trying to fix it.

┬─┬ノ( º _ ºノ)


It'll just take some time. I'm sure they're doing their best.

┬─┬ノ( º _ ºノ)


┬─┬ノ( º _ ºノ)


┬─┬ノ( º _ ºノ)


(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻
